scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: In this letter dated September 6, 1938 from Baird, Texas, Otis Bowyer writes to T. Bowyer Campbell in Notre Dame, Indiana giving a description of the careers of Gen. John Bowyer, T. Bowyer Campbell's great great grandfather, and of his nephew, John Bowyer.
